### HasSectionLabel {#ad830ed9bf761736e7718478affc36c36}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DenseMap&lt;const MCSection&#42;, bool&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MCMachOStreamer.cpp&#125;::MCMachOStreamer::HasSectionLabel</>}>
HasSectionLabel - map of which sections have already had a non-local label emitted to them.

Used so we don&#39;t emit extraneous linker local labels in the middle of the section.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp">MCMachOStreamer.cpp</a>.

### LabelSections {#a80477ccc1d151b86b7586ed78104f0d5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;MCMachOStreamer.cpp&#125;::MCMachOStreamer::LabelSections</>}>
LabelSections - true if each section change should emit a linker local label for use in relocations for assembler local references.

Obviates the need for local relocations. False by default.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp">MCMachOStreamer.cpp</a>.

### emitAssignment {#a34ce30f596de6334b5f17323b15e4fa4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void MCMachOStreamer::emitAssignment (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; Symbol, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42; Value)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Emit an assignment of <code>Value</code> to <code>Symbol</code>.

This corresponds to an assembler statement such as: symbol = value

The assignment generates no code, but has the side effect of binding the value in the current context. For the assembly streamer, this prints the binding into the .s file.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Symbol">- The symbol being assigned to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Value">- The value for the symbol.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/mc/mcmachostreamer-cpp">MCMachOStreamer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Emit/Specify Mach-O build version command.

<code>Platform</code> should be one of MachO::PlatformType.
